item.description:
Amy will be introducing us to Wittgenstein.

COULDN'T THINK OF A VIABLE ALTERNATIVE FOR SUCH A FULL CORWD, SO WE'LL MEET AT OUR USUAL SPOT IRISH HARP PUB; THE BRUINS GAME STARTS AT 7PM, SO HOPEFULLY WE'LL BE OK. IF NOT, THERE IS A PUB AROUND THE CORNER WHO'S NAME I FORGET, BUT IT'S WHERE WE WERE LAST TIME.

See you there!

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Wittgenstein
